1.title: If the Walls Could Talk

 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Phantasmic Ghost Hunters is an American paranormal television series that premiered on October 13, 2013 in the United States on GTN. The series features 2 Investigators which are out to get documented proof there is life after death. What really happens when we die, where do we go, and how can we communicate with the dead. We document all evidence where capture whether it be in video's, photo's or EVPS The show airs on Saturdays at 9/8c. The series follows the paranormal team known as the "The Phantasmic Ghost Hunters"; as they seek out and try to make the communication with the other side at numerous haunted locations in the United States.
